welcome_message_body: Welcome to Onna, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Onna has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iejima Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iejima Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport serves flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
